hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
# Setup configuration for robot job ZIP_SRC=$(ls openmicroscopy*zip) SRC=$WORKSPACE/${ZIP_SRC%.zip} unzip $ZIP_SRC rm -f $ZIP_SRC
ZIP_DIST=$(ls OMERO.server*.zip) unzip $ZIP_DIST rm -f $ZIP_DIST mv $WORKSPACE/${ZIP_DIST%.zip} $SRC/dist
$SRC/dist/bin/omero config set omero.web.prefix "/web"
bash $SRC/components/tests/ui/robot_setup.sh mv $SRC/dist/robot_ice.config $SRC/components/tests/ui/resources/ export ICE_CONFIG=$SRC/components/tests/ui/resources/robot_ice.config $SRC/dist/bin/omero --path $SRC/components/tests/ui/plugins robot config --protocol http --webhost nginx --remoteurl 'http://seleniumhub:4444/wd/hub --dc browserName:${BROWSER},javascriptEnabled:True' > $SRC/components/tests/ui/resources/config.txt

echo Running the UI tests export JAVA_OPTS="-d32"
$SRC/build.py -f components/tests/ui/build.xml -Dtest.with.fail=false ui-test-web
#aggregate the various output files. $SRC/build.py -f components/tests/ui/build.xml aggregate-results
